de.devbliss.apitester
Class ApiResponse

java.lang.Object
  de.devbliss.apitester.ApiResponse

public class ApiResponse
extends Object

Data container for the most important parts of a HTTP response. Easier to use than HttpResponse. Able to parse raw response body as json and then convert it to a given type. Contains some isStatus...() convenience methods for the most frequently used HTTP status codes.

Author:
hschuetz

getHeader

public String getHeader(String name)
Get the header value with the given name

Parameters:
name - The name of the header. As per the RFC, header names are case insensitive
Returns:
The value, or null if no header with that name was found
